titles.title: Providing for a conditional adjournment of the House of Representatives and a conditional recess or adjournment of the Senate.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 8/2/2001--Passed House without amendment. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from August 2 or 3, 2001, until September 5, 2001, and a recess or an adjournment of the Senate on any day between August 2 and 4, 2001, or between August 6 and 11, 2001, until September 4, 2001.
